info.title: Lipas-API
info.description: Finnish sports places as open data

parameters.name: retkikartta
parameters.description: Limit search to sports places that are also visible in Retkikartta.fi

parameters.name: harrastuspassi
parameters.description:
Limit search to sports places that are also
  visible in Harrastuspassi.fi

get.description: Returns a list of sports places. The result set can be filtered by type-codes and city-codes. Result set content depends on selected fields. By default only the sports place id is returned.

get.summary: Get list of sports place types

get.description: Official categorization of sports place types
get.summary: Get list of sports place type categories

Coordinates.description: Simple Point coordinates of the location.

name.description: Primary (Finnish) name of the sports place

freeUse.description: Sports place is accessible without fees or reservation

lastModified.description: Last modification timestamp in Europe/Helsinki TZ

nameEn.description: English name of the sports place

nameSe.description: Swedish name of the sports place
